sentence.Network_en: Garden plants sometimes revert to type.
sentence.Network_cn: 园艺植物有时会恢复其原来的野生形态.

sentence.Network_en: When it returns to shore, the life-jacket will deflate and revert to a harness.
sentence.Network_cn: 返回岸上后，救生衣就会瘪掉，恢复成背带状。

sentence.Network_en: They will revert to tilling the earth in an old-fashioned way.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将回归到用老方法耕地。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French revertir or Latin revertere 'turn back'. Early senses included 'recover consciousness', 'return to a position', and 'return to a person (after estrangement)'

entry.tran: 恢复，回复(到以前的状态、制度或行为)
entry.def: When people or things revert to a previous state, system, or type of behaviour, they go back to it.

example.ex: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
example.tran: 杰克逊说她的老板情绪越来越低落，又开始拼命抽烟了。

entry.tran: 回到，重提，重新考虑(某个话题)
entry.def: When someone reverts to a previous topic, they start talking or thinking about it again.

example.ex: In the car she reverted to the subject uppermost in her mind.
example.tran: 在车里，她又提起了她最关心的话题。

entry.def: If you revert to your usual language, you start using that language again.

example.ex: After all these years she had reverted to her Veneto dialect and nobody could understand what she was saying.
example.tran: 这么多年后，她又开始讲威尼托方言，没有人能听懂她的话。

entry.def: If property, rights, or money revert to someone, they become that person's again after someone else has had them for a period of time.

example.ex: When the lease ends, the property reverts to the freeholder.
example.tran: 租期结束后，该房产会归还给其终身所有者。

entry.def: If you say that someone has reverted to type, you mean that they are now behaving as you would expect them to, after having behaved in an unexpected and better way.

example.ex: He was adamant that this setback does not mean he has reverted to type.
example.tran: 他坚持认为这次挫折并不意味着他已经回到原来的样子。

means.word_mean: 1. go back to a previous state;
2. undergo reversion, as in a mutation

auth_sentence.content: Excuse us while we revert to childhood for a while.

auth_sentence.content: I will revert to the House as necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will revert to the House as necessary.

stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.word_buile: controvert[v.反驳,驳斥]+ible可..的→adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 更换信仰的, 修改的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ed……的→adj.更换信仰的, 修改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可改变的, 自由兑换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: convert[v.变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]]+ible可..的→adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+controvertible[adj.可争论的, 有辩论余地的, 可辩论的]→adj.无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+convertible[adj.可改变的, 自由兑换的]→adj.不能兑换的,不能变换的
advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防止,避免 ;转移[目光,注意力等]
变换,转换;改变[信仰等];兑换[钱]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使转向,使改道;转移[注意力];使娱乐

Sentence.sentence: Under the settlement, when no rights holders come forward and register their interest in a work, commercial control automatically reverts to Google.

sentences.en: After his death the house reverted to its original owner.
sentences.cn: 他死后房子归还给了原先的主人。

sentences.en: After 80 years as a school, the building has reverted back to being a house again.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑用作校舍80 年之后又重新成为住房。

sentences.en: After the settlers left, the area reverted to desert.
sentences.cn: 早期移民离开之后, 这个地区又变成了一片沙漠。

means.word_mean: 恢复本性；重操旧业；故态复萌

sentences.en: She was a student revolutionary for a while but now she’s reverted to type. I saw her in a Mercedes the other day.
sentences.cn: 她曾经是一位支持革命的学生，但是现在她又恢复原样了。几天前我看见她坐在一辆梅塞德斯车里。

sentences.en: Garden plants sometimes revert to type.
sentences.cn: 园艺植物有时会恢复其原来的野生形态。

sentences.en: After a good year the team reverted to type in their last game.
sentences.cn: 这个队好了一年,上一场比赛中又故态复萌。

sentences.en: The boss came back from holiday all relaxed and smiling, but now he’s reverting to type.
sentences.cn: 老板刚度假回来时十分随和，满面笑容，现在又恢复原样了。
